content: davidtwco renamed stream t-compiler/diagnostics to t-compiler/wg-diagnostics
pinging @Daniel Silverstone (aka kinnison) because they can't find this stream

Thanks @DPC

For those who don't know, I've been being tagged into reviewing some error messges and the like by @GuillaumeGomez (?) because i was helping with rustdoc before. I'm gaining experience with it, and with the style of the language in use, looking at others' reviews of the same content has helped a lot, particularly recently. However it'd be helpful if I were able to r+ those which were ready, when I asked about that, it was suggested @nikomatsakis should make the decision; so, Niko, is there any chance I might be granted the rights for that?

Otherwise I'll carry on as I have been, thanks for welcoming me in.

D.
Hey @Daniel Silverstone -- did you also ping on Discord? What's your github name btw?
I did, and we chatted :-D My github username is Kinnison
